subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: When the game needed to be saved, a home run ball found the glove of Melky Cabrera, the youngest player on the roster, a homegrown Yankee best known, until recently, for failing a brief audition last summer.
snippet: When the game needed to be saved, a home run ball found the glove of Melky Cabrera, the youngest player on the roster, a homegrown Yankee best known, until recently, for failing a brief audition last summer.
